Job Description: Connectivity-IOT & Telemetry – Senior Engineering Manager, Software DevelopmentRole IntroductionWe are seeking a versatile Software Development Manager to develop cutting-edge IoT software solutions to optimize and grow our business operations. In this role, your duties will include managing the careers of Software Developers, the application of programming technologies, processes, and methodologies to develop, maintain, deploy and support business applications in a Product based development environment.Dell -Connectivity/IoT and Telemetry.Dell maintains a strong commitment to protecting customers' information infrastructure through the 24x7 availability of always-on secure connectivity. The Connectivity/IoT provides 24x7 availability of always-on secure connectivity. It is a secure, IP-based, distributed connectivity solution that offers Remote Takeover and Diagnostics, Telemetry and Event Management, Software Distribution, and Remote Scripting & Provisioning. Connectivity/IoT is an asynchronous messaging system in which all communications are initiated from the customer side.
